findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials on WordPress REST API endpoint can enable cross-origin data theft and potential account takeover attacks.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes authenticated requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 to steal sensitive page data, or use other WordPress REST API endpoints to modify content or extract user information if the victim is logged into Plex's WordPress backend.
